<%
/* legacy support is to link to the product detail page. however, if this is loaded in popup.cgi, product is passed on URI and needs to be put into focus */

print("");
loadurp("VAR::product"); default("");
stop(unless=>$_);
	set($FOCUSSKU=>$_);
	element(TYPE=>"SET",SRC=>"SREF::PID",DATA=>$FOCUSSKU);
	element(TYPE=>"SET",SRC=>"SREF::SKU",DATA=>$FOCUSSKU);
	print("<!-- focus sku changed to: ");
	print($FOCUSSKU);
	print(" -->");
%>

<%
/* big Image. Used specl instead of an IMAGE element so that a specific image other that prod_image1 could be loaded */
print("");
loadurp("VAR::targetimageid"); default("1");
format(pretext=>"product:zoovy:prod_image");
loadurp($_);
image(h=>"480",w=>"640",m=>"1",bg=>"ffffff",tag=>"1");
print();
%>

<% print(""); /* used for the alt tag and title */ loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_name"); format(encode=>"entity"); set($PROD_NAME=>$_); set($i=>"1"); /* this is the product field that we append $i to for generating the image key. */ set($image_key=>"product:zoovy:prod_image"); :LOOP(); load($image_key); format(posttext=>$i); loadurp($_); /* we use the filename in multiple places, so a var is set instead of loadurp'ing it several times. */ set($image=>$_); /* if the current load has no value, then there are no more images to process. Stop. Otherwise, preload image and print thumbnail with JS to change big image */ stop(unless=>$_); print(""); print("
"); /* fix the width but support variable height to be more flexible */ image(src=>$image,w=>"75",h=>"200",m=>"1",tag=>"1",alt=>$PROD_NAME); print(); print("
"); /* increment i by one for next loadurp */ load($i); math(op=>"add",var=>"1"); set($i=>$_); /* Go to loop and do it all again. */ goto(label=>"LOOP",ne=>""); %>
